text: careware license this script is released as careware it may be freely distributed used modified and whatever provided that the user at least once per use performs any of the following 1   smiles at somebody something 2   hugs or pats on the shoulder a friend colleague pet furry little creature from alpha centauri 3   acts nicely towards a friend foreigner alien any other living being 4   kisses his her girlfriend wife boyfriend husband any other living being de gustibus 5   feels happy even without apparent reason 6   stops whining for an hour a day a week your choice important note if you dont like this idea just ignore it    you can have this anyway
thats one way to distinguish the world of ideas from the rest of human history you can disregard an idea  and no one knocks on your door at midnight
